acceptEscrow(uint256,bytes).details: Required when buyer uses createEscrowAndDeposit so seller can authorize withdrawals

params.sellerWalletSig: Seller's EIP-712 signature for wallet authorization

autoRelease(uint256).details: Seller can claim funds after maturityTime + GRACE_PERIOD if:      - Escrow is in AWAITING_DELIVERY state      - No dispute has been started      - Buyer has not requested cancellation      - maturityTime + GRACE_PERIOD has passed      - Seller has provided wallet signature

params.buyerWalletSig: Buyer's EIP-712 signature for wallet authorization

params.sellerWalletSig: Seller's EIP-712 signature for wallet authorization
params.title: Escrow title

params.buyerWalletSig: Buyer's EIP-712 signature for wallet authorization
params.title: Escrow title

params.buyerWalletSig: Buyer's EIP-712 signature for wallet authorization

returns._0: The bitmap where each bit represents if nonce (wordIndex*256 + bitPosition) is used

getWalletAuthorizationDigest(uint256,add.details: Frontend can use this to generate the correct signature

params.walletSig: Caller's EIP-712 signature for wallet authorization

params.arbiterWalletSig: Arbiter's EIP-712 signature for wallet authorization
params.ipfsHash: IPFS hash of the decision explanation

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: Returns the escrow contract's domain separator

acceptEscrow(uint256,bytes).notice: Seller accepts a buyer-created escrow and provides wallet signature

autoRelease(uint256).notice: Auto-releases funds to seller after maturity + grace period if buyer hasn't confirmed

cancelByTimeout(uint256).notice: Cancels escrow after maturity + grace period (called by buyer)

confirmDelivery(uint256,bytes).notice: Confirms delivery and releases funds to seller (called by buyer)

confirmDeliverySigned(uint256,bytes,uint.notice: Confirms delivery via EIP-712 signature (gasless for buyer)

createEscrow(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Creates a new escrow (called by seller)

createEscrowAndDeposit(address,address,u.notice: Creates escrow and deposits in one transaction (called by buyer)

deposit(uint256,bytes).notice: Deposits funds into an existing escrow (called by buyer)

getNonceBitmap(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Get the nonce bitmap for a given escrow/signer/word

getWalletAuthorizationDigest(uint256,add.notice: Computes the wallet authorization digest for a participant

requestCancel(uint256,bytes).notice: Requests cancellation (requires both parties for mutual cancel)

startDispute(uint256).notice: Starts a dispute (called by buyer or seller)

startDisputeSigned(uint256,bytes,uint256.notice: Starts dispute via EIP-712 signature (gasless for buyer/seller)

submitArbiterDecision(uint256,uint8,stri.notice: Submits arbiter's decision for a dispute

submitDisputeMessage(uint256,uint8,strin.notice: Submits evidence for a dispute (called by buyer or seller)
